name: dikatesh
description:
slapped this together in a couple of hours as a joke

two player "fighting game" with barely any aspects of fighting games

Controls

Player 1

a to move left, s to move right, d to attack, f to dash attack

Player 2

j to move left, k to move right, l to attack, ; to dash attack

press space to reset

hit your opponent into the wall to beat them. the higher the percent, the higher the knockback
